snippet: “League of Denial,” a Frontline report on PBS, recaps the league’s response to mounting medical evidence about football’s link to brain injuries.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews television show League of Denial: The NFL's Concussion Crisis on PBS series Frontline.
lead_paragraph: “League of Denial,” a Frontline report on PBS, recaps the league’s response to mounting medical evidence about football’s link to brain injuries.

headline.seo: ‘League of Denial’ Looks at N.F.L. and Concussions
headline.main: Collisions of Football Helmets and Money
headline.print_headline: Collisions of Football Helmets and Money
